title: Does anyone know when 6.9 will come?
body: I really want to know. Is it next Tuesday?

replies.body:
Mid next week is looking likely. 

As with any patch though release date won't be certain until we've finished our final bug pass and other checks.
Will Graves get his cigar?

> **[Network Operations](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_US#na)** 

> On 05/04/16, starting at, 01:30 Pacific Time (08:30 UTC), ranked queues will be disabled in preparation for patch 6.9. At 03:00 Pacific time (10:00 UTC), the servers will be shut down and all games currently in progress will end in a draw and stats will not be recorded. We estimate the battlegrounds will be unavailable for 3 hours.

Thanks for realizing my prediction. Love ya <3

And you're going to complete the bug pass and other checks successfully like you always do...

Why make it look like you're doubting your abilities to do it on-time? I find it petty.

> [{quoted}](name=Rineyy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=yW4GANdc,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2016-04-30T01:35:19.819+0000)
>
> And you're going to complete the bug pass and other checks successfully like you always do...
> 
> Why make it look like you're doubting your abilities to do it on-time? I find it petty.

They don't always do it successfully, though. The date they plan is Wednesday but it's not at all rare that the patch goes out on Thursday because something cropped up, and it was less than a year ago that they had a patch on a Friday.

The internal date planned will be Wednesday but they can't say that for sure because it only ends up being on Wednesday like 60% of the time.

> **[Network Operations](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_US#na)** 

> On 05/04/16, starting at, 01:30 Pacific Time (08:30 UTC), ranked queues will be disabled in preparation for patch 6.9. At 03:00 Pacific time (10:00 UTC), the servers will be shut down and all games currently in progress will end in a draw and stats will not be recorded. We estimate the battlegrounds will be unavailable for 3 hours.

I did say Wednesday or Thursday. I'm aware of numerous Thursday patches, I still consider those on-time. Basically, they almost always pull through and I'm saying they'll pull through this time like almost every other...

How is it petty exactly? You rven just admitted that they have plenty of patches later than usual. Even though you consider that on time, Riot does not.

Recent example would be Kindred's release. That had to be delayed for like, a whole patch IIRC.

Kindred was delayed, the patch wasn't. The petty part was a joke, but nobody detected that. Thursday is still more or less the mid of a week so it doesn't necessarily mean delayed if it's not on a Wednesday.

Well yeah, I even said it was just Kindred. The point though was they aren't afraid to delay things if they believe it isn't ready yet. Who says they wouldn't delay a patch if need be?

Also, I don't think anyone caught onto your joke because it wasn't obvious / funny? Not meant to offend, I sincerely didn't realize it was a joke.

> **[Network Operations](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_US#na)** 

> On 05/04/16, starting at, 01:30 Pacific Time (08:30 UTC), ranked queues will be disabled in preparation for patch 6.9. At 03:00 Pacific time (10:00 UTC), the servers will be shut down and all games currently in progress will end in a draw and stats will not be recorded. We estimate the battlegrounds will be unavailable for 3 hours.

I know they'd delay it if need be but I want 6.9 on-time so I'm saying it will be on-time lol (and it most likely will be). 

And it's ok.

Because if they ever promise something and don't deliver 100% the pitchforks and torches get brought out. I'd prefer an honest answer like that over "We'll definitely have it ready on this date and this time" because to me that's making promises you might not be able to keep.
I understand the reason for the structure of his answer, I just think they should speak the answer anyway 'cause it's gonna be on-time lol.
i hope rengar will be playable ,not  DENDIED SHIV/TRIFORCE/RFC /DEADMAN AND AERIAL BOLA 5 M NEXT to target ,thx
Any chance fixed to the picking room will be included in the patch?  Maybe something to solve the primary/secondary role disaster?
Will that be the mage update? Also with the awesome warmogs change and rengar bug fixes?^^<3

Thanks for fixing malz jungle though XD
Fun while it lasted anyway.

Meddler...do me a favor....
Glitch Twitch's poison to do 100 True damage per stack for 1 day...just to make him extremely terrifying for 4 hours!!! lol
It will come like a thief in the night. No one will see it coming.
+1 for a Bible reference. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
that is such a weird thing to see next to a picture of jinx.
Lol.
Should most likely be Wednesday if nothing delays it.
It is.
Tomorrow I'm pretty sure. May 4th

Before I forget...
5 bans per team from here on out!
No more 3 bans!!!!
Or balance. Balance works.

I would prefer 5 bans for ARAM's and Rotations...
Drafts?  Why bother.
Gonna get some butt-hurt noob on the enemy team (or yours) who gets their main banned and will rage quit resulting in a PROLONGED Que...

No thanks.
Blind Picks are better all around for ranked games.
Patches generally come every 2-3 weeks. So probably next week sometime.
Every 2 weeks bro. Riot doesn't like skipping more than a week between patches.

> [{quoted}](name=Rineyy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=yW4GANdc,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-04-30T01:39:47.848+0000)
>
> Every 2 weeks bro. Riot doesn't like skipping more than a week between patches.

Then why did you even ask this question in a thread?

Also, I think Kindred's patch was delayed.

I didn't ask the question. I'm not the thread starter, I'm answering the question though.

Kindred's patch wasn't delayed. Kindred themselves were delayed by a patch due to a bug. The patch was still on-time though.
Between then and Thursday I think

Wednesday, May 4th, or Thursday, May 5th.  

If it's later than Thursday, May 5th then Riot purposefully delayed the patch to troll me.
